dmca.title: Wonton Media complains of blogged images
dmca.body:
Dear Google Inc. 

RE: NOTICE OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT 

Under The Digital Millennium Copyright Act, please be served this: 
TAKE NOTICE that you and/or your company are hosting and delivering by electronic means a Web site, or you and/or your company are referring or linking containing infringing material or infringing activity, by using information location tools, including one or more of: a directory; index; reference; pointer: or hypertext link to a Web site known as: 
 
http://felicityfey.blogspot.com/

This site contains photographs, images, and/or other digital media that are the sole, exclusive, and copyrighted property of Wonton Media LLC.
 
The images have not been licensed at any time to the registered owner of the domain BlogSpot.com. We hereby state that we have been informed, and thereby believe and aver in good faith that no parties have licensed the images to be used on the Web site indicated above. 

The originals of the images are on file a the offices of Wonton Media LLC 

Under penalty of perjury we hereby state that this notice is accurate and that we represent the copyright owner of the images in question. 

Infringing images have been found at the Internet location(s) at: 

http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/042.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/062.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/104.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/133.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/152.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/171.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/22.jpg
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/23.jpp
http://photos1.blogger.com/110/2065/1024/24.jpg


 
I hereby declare under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United Stares of America that the foregoing is true and correct.

Should you require any further information regarding this matter, please contact me at the address, telephone number or email address indicated below 

Sincerely, 
[signed]
[private]
Wonton Media LLC 
[private]
Laredo, TX 78041-2698 
[private]
copyright@wontonmedia.com
